text:
Naruko Studio is a versatile team engaged in various projects.
We create bots for platforms like Discord and Telegram.
We develop streaming tools, such as song request websites and Twitch bots.
We build websites, including our official site.
We specialize in video editing, like the VOD clipping mentioned earlier.
Our expertise also extends to server setup for Minecraft, NAS, Pal World, Rust, Proxmox VE, and more.
We also run live streams, primarily on Twitch.
